column4: U.S. court halts $8.2 billion Activision deal with Vivendi

column4: INSIGHT-Embraer's Herculean task: Brazilian jet takes on Lockheed
column5: By Brad Haynes     SAO JOSE DOS CAMPOS  Brazil  Sept 19 For decades Brazilian planemaker Embraer SA has kept its head down  shying away from larger aircraft in competition with industry giants that its executives called the "big dogs."     A military cargo plane trundling down the runway is about to change that.      In a direct challenge to Lockheed Martin Corp's  storied Hercules airlifter  Embraer is promising a jet that flies higher  fuller and faster - at a lower price.     The

column4: INSIGHT-Embraer's Herculean task: Brazilian jet takes on Lockheed
column5: By Brad Haynes     SAO JOSE DOS CAMPOS  Brazil  Sept 19 For decades Brazilian planemaker Embraer SA has kept its head down  shying away from larger aircraft in competition with industry giants that its executives called the "big dogs."     A military cargo plane trundling down the runway is about to change that.      In a direct challenge to Lockheed Martin Corp's  storied Hercules airlifter  Embraer is promising a jet that flies higher  fuller and faster - at a lower price.     The
